title: My Favorite Shopping Experience
description: Write about a shopping experience or your shopping habits.

prompt.description: Describe your shopping habits or a memorable shopping experience. You can write about what you bought, where you shopped, and how you felt.
requirements: Describe where you usually shop or where you went
Explain what you bought or like to buy
Use future tense (will/going to) at least once
Share your opinion about shopping (like/don't like)
Include at least one shopping vocabulary word

exampleSentences.sentence: I usually shop at the department store near my house.
exampleSentences.translation: 저는 보통 집 근처 백화점에서 쇼핑합니다.

exampleSentences.sentence: Last weekend, I bought a new jacket on sale.
exampleSentences.translation: 지난 주말에 세일하는 새 재킷을 샀습니다.

exampleSentences.sentence: I'm going to save money for a new phone.
exampleSentences.translation: 새 폰을 위해 돈을 모을 거예요.

exampleSentences.sentence: I prefer online shopping because it's more convenient.
exampleSentences.translation: 저는 더 편리하기 때문에 온라인 쇼핑을 선호합니다.

exampleSentences.sentence: The discount was great, so I saved a lot of money.

items: Did you mention where you shop?
Did you describe what you bought/like to buy?
Did you use future tense at least once?
Did you use correct verb tenses?
Did you use 'will' or 'going to' correctly?
Did you include an introduction and conclusion?
